ðŸ“– Summary: reTermAI is a smart command assistant that suggests relevant terminal commands based on your past shell history, leveraging AI models like OpenAI and Gemini. It supports intelligent matching by keyword or partial input and is easily installable via pip, supporting both zsh and bash shells. API keys are managed securely via a .env file.
